ARABIC: لَخَلْقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ أَكْبَرُ مِنْ خَلْقِ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The creation of the heavens and earth is far greater than the creation of mankind. But most of mankind do not know it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The creation of the heavens and the earth is indeed of greater magnitude than the creation of mankind; but most men do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely the creation of the heavens and the earth is a greater act than the creation of human beings. But most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The creation of the heavens and the earth is certainly greater than the creation of mankind, but most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Certainly the creation of the heavens and the earth is far greater than the creation of men, but most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The creation of the heavens and the earth is indeed greater than the creation of mankind; yet, most of the people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Certainly the creation of the heavens and the earth is greater than the creation of the men, but most people do not know
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Certainly the creation of the heavens and earth is greater than the creation of men; but most men know it not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Assuredly the creation of the heavens and the earth is greater than the creation of mankind; but most of mankind know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Certainly, the creation of the heavens and the earth is greater than the creation of mankind; but most people do not know this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The creation of the heavens and the earth is indeed greater than the creation of mankind; but most of man kind know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The creation of the heavens and the earth is surely more prodigious than the creation of mankind, but most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Assuredly the creation of the heavens and the earth is a greater (matter) than the creation of men: Yet most men understand not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The creation of the heavens and the earth is indeed greater than the creation of mankind, yet most of mankind know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, the creation of heavens and earth is greater than the creation of mankind, yet most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Certainly the creation of the heavens and the earth is greater than the creation of humanity, but most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The creation of the heavens and earth is greater than the creation of mankind, but most of the people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:57] The following was revealed regarding the deniers of resurrection: Assuredly the creation of the heavens and the earth, as an [unprecedented] first act, is greater than the creation of mankind, a second time — which is the restoration [of them after death]; but most people, namely, the disbelievers of Mecca, do not know, this, and so they are like the blind, whereas those who know it are like those who have sight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Assuredly the creation of the heavens and the earth is greater than the creation of mankind) than the creation of the anti-Christ; (but most of mankind) i.e. the Jews (know not) the sedition of the anti-Christ.
